name: data-engineering-prompts-and-chat-modes
description: **Awesome Copilot: Data Engineering Edition** is a ready-to-use collection of custom Prompts, Chat Modes, Instructions, and Analytics Pattern blueprints for GitHub Copilot. It supercharges Copilot to assist with data engineering tasks: designing pipelines, modeling data, writing SQL, debugging ETL, ensuring data quality, and more.
